author: sboag
msg: Fix for array out of bounds exception in findNamespaceContext, where the index was allowed to go to -1.  This is a blind fix, and someone who knows the code better should take a look to see what they think.

author: ilene
msg: New FAQ from Christine Li (jycli@ca.ibm.com) for using Xalan in Tomcat

author: santiagopg
msg: Set SourceLocator in stylesheet instead of XSLTC object. This ensures
proper use of user-defined URIResolvers in a TemplatesHandler.

author: zongaro
msg: Applying patches from Igor Hersht (igorh@ca.ibm.com) for bug 15200 and
Pulled EmptyIterator class out of SAXImpl to allow for more widespread use.
